website_summaries.verdict: If a lightweight running shoe that also works well as a work or exercise shoe appeals to you, then the Solar Boost is one to consider. Sizing can be challenging, but customers say the right fit feels like wearing bedroom slippers.
pros: Exceptionally lightweight and comfortable, good spring
Works as a stylish casual shoe
cons: Not as supportive in the arch or ankle as other models
Sole can become separated from upper
Wet weather can be problematic with treads

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These hoes are mad comfortable. Don't even second guess about buying these bitches, just go ahead and buy em.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Classy, but not good for running/sports
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sneakers that are super comfy but definitely not running shoes. I usually run in Brooks, so I'm used to a ton of support and when I put these on I like how they look but they are just casual shoes. Walked all day with them in New York without any problems, but I definitely don't recommend these for any serious sports. I'd categorize them as fashion sneakers, the "adidas Performance Men's Solar Boost M Running" is totally wrong. If these shoes were classified as comfort and style, then you've got a great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I feel that these shoes are worthy of one. Very lightweight and comfortable, fit exactly as expected, almost feels like you're not even wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: and they are very comfortable. They breathe well
customer_reviews.text: I spend my work day on my feet. I walk about 14 miles a day at a fast pace. These shoes almost weigh nothing, and they are very comfortable. They breathe well, and look great. I got a lot of compliments on them. Great shoes, great price.
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly comfortable. I like shoes that are flexible when working out, and these are them. I had a pair of Reeboks that I loved and ran to the ground for running/exercise and could not find them, so I decided to give these a try and I am glad I did. I think these are my favorite workout shoes ever. I would recommend these to anyone who wants comfortable and flexible shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: Ripped!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed my son bought these in June and began wearing them in September when school started. He loved them. But today he came home from school and both two beds have completely ripped from toe sole to where the shoe strings start. Seems to me that they should last more than 4 to 5 months. His foot is no longer growing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Herr

customer_reviews.title: ... posted a review saying that "these hoes are mad comfortable. " I couldn't have said it better myself
customer_reviews.text: Somebody else posted a review saying that "these hoes are mad comfortable." I couldn't have said it better myself. They have a great lightweight feel, but are definitely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for a few days running at the gym, but I can already say they're more comfortable than any Nikes I've had. Might be getting Adidas from now on!
customer_reviews.author: *sc*

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so it's no surprise that these fit somewhat snug on the sides. Still fit comfortably and I love the look. Mine are used as a basic street shoe, not for running. I don't know that I'd trust these for extended rigorous physical activity.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes/comfortable, super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, get compliments all the time, extremely comfortable. Super light weight, like being barefoot in the rain/cold & the white part of the soles require constant cleaning. But still my favorite shoes. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Puyallup, WA

customer_reviews.title: Love my Adidas sneakers and these didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Love my Adidas sneakers and these didn't disappoint. Fit as expected with a great casual look. The secondary color peeks through the primary color in what feels like a sock liner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGee

customer_reviews.text: These shoes are by far the best shoes I've had. I've just had them from about a month now and these are really comfortable. ( and this comes from a person who owns nikes most comfortable and popular shoes, such as, the Nike flyknit free 4.0's and the Nike flyknit Racers and etc).
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Only problem is that after 2 days of wearing them the sole on the heel started to come off. Its not drastic but irritating enough that two day old shoes have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes if you want comfy shoes. My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: M. muse

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, very comfortable. As a nurse, I stand and walk 8plus hours a day, and these are comfortable and breathe well.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Like walking or running on pillows
customer_reviews.text: Finally the cushy trainers I have been looking for. I could (and often do) live in these things.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Signaigo

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe, was not fake, and fit perfectly, One of the most comfortable shoes I ever used for running.
customer_reviews.author: kmpballer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and probably not very good running shoes. They are pretty cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mangone

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES THEM!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, he said he feels like he's walking on water! So comfortable! He's received many compliments on them, even with them being bright red!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherH

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They're very comfortable and I bought them to match a lot of the maroon colored clothing that I have and they do not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: KAREEM

customer_reviews.title: super lightweight, and provide good grip in the gym
customer_reviews.text: bought these on a whim from the top rated review. these are breathable to the point where i feel a breeze through the shoe, super lightweight, and provide good grip in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for compliments on your new Aggie maroon and white kicks!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these shoes all the time and the fact that they are Aggie maroon and white really makes them pop! Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: ... were a gift for my grandson and he was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for my grandson and he was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brandvold

customer_reviews.title: Average shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe but arch support is very average at best. Running in these all day killed my feet. Great for wearing at the gym for a few hours or for walking around town. Bottom traction is below average with a weird "waffle" design.
customer_reviews.author: Rosser

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe; Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe, but definitely order one half size larger. I always always wear a 10 US Mens and this 10 US Mens was too tight. Other than that, buy it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brent Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe! Comfortable and great during track practice as well as all day wear!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Me

customer_reviews.title: They are the best fitting and comfortable shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes on my cardio days. They are the best fitting and comfortable shoes for running, stairs, or anything I feel that day. It is like running on clouds. Wonderful shoes and seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers are 2 weeks old, and only used about 10 times for 3 hrs per use at gym. Soles fell apart or became unglued. I will not recommend you to buy these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy:)
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is AWESOME....so very comfortable. Would definitely buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Nancntonic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I'm on my feet all day at work
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: It fits like a 10
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is labelled as 10-1/2. It fits like a 10.
customer_reviews.author: JEK

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. It's like walking on air cushions
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. It's like walking on air cushions. On the down side, I ordered my usual size and I wish now I had order 1 size above. The fit is tight. But still I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dominique SURAN

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe. I have two pair now. Very lightweight and a lot of comfort. Great for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: JB KEMPER

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with style.
customer_reviews.text: Was amazed by the comfort of the shoe and the color was a match for my attire.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: ... look very stylish and he says they are very comfortable. Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look very stylish and he says they are very comfortable. Very happy so far! He liked the look as well.
customer_reviews.author: KellyeUp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light, super comfortable. Runs small though. I were a 12 and I had to get a 12.5
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Featherweight yet supportive!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them. They are so lightweight and bouncy, yet offer great support.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Need a size or half a size larger
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it... I needed half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - Affordable - Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I had these sent to my son in college and he says they are awesome! The fit, the comfort level, and the style were great! He walks A LOT back and forth across campus and they are working out really well - said they were comfortable right away - no need to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a timely manner and are one of the most comfortable sneakers I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in a timely manner and are one of the most comfortable sneakers I have ever worn. I would definitely order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Coppermd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get one size smaller. It fits alike a shoe and not as a sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Cool Kicks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, he loves them! Nice cool design as well!
customer_reviews.author: Twilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Boosts... and these look sharp and do as told. Cheap too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot good for squats deadlifts and cardio
customer_reviews.author: gvt

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and the best part the tongue does not slip to the sides, it always stays in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes Very lightweight and very cushioned on the heels
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: Have another pair in dark navy blue. Feels like a pair of bedroom slippers and light weight. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Indyg8tor

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship not up the name Adidas, stitching around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship not up the name Adidas, stitching around the tong of the shoe are not finished and stitching comes loose.
customer_reviews.author: Masserati58

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes .but I have a question since it tears easily do you hand wash these shoes or is it ok ?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley BLankenship

customer_reviews.title: great shoe. sometimes when i go running i feel ...
customer_reviews.text: great shoe. sometimes when i go running i feel like its not supporting the arch of my foot, but besides that i love it
customer_reviews.author: jonmom

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair great all day wear
customer_reviews.text: Amazing weight and comfort for all day on your feet
customer_reviews.author: Free Market

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how gear these shoes feel. Incredibly light. Surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Extremely comfortable and nice looking!! I ordered the light blue ones and even tho they are a bit brighter than they looked, they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Botero

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband was happy with these shoes. Says they are comfortable and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable  shoe and a great look
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these sneakers. Great design and a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light and can feel the shoes breathing. Really like these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: James Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Loren hickman

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: They're super cute. Purchased because I needed new shoes for the gym. They have worked out so far. I wear an 8.5 in women and ordered a 7.5 in men. They fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Nstag8tr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price
customer_reviews.text: Cool, lightweight, comfortable, and good looking. A little smaller than I expected, but a very nice fit for running in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking but beware that the size does ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking but beware that the size does run a touch small. I ordered and had to return for a size up but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light, Cushy, heel strike shoe. Maybe a bit warm for some.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, great heel cushion, look is great too. They do what they are meant to do. Im a runner and I like extremely breathable shoes, these however are not. I usually ride my bike to work, and while riding i can feel air flow, but while running its lacking the breathability I like. For me I would not order them again. They will just sit in my closet until the colder running season comes around
customer_reviews.author: Slick B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks so cool, great shade of red, very light weight and comfortable, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nugee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoe, which I wear every day walking 2-3 miles to gym.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! No problems and came a week early
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe. Would recommend a full size larger than normal
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Han

customer_reviews.title: Not bad though, not enough to return them
customer_reviews.text: Bout a half size small. Not bad though, not enough to return them. Still comfy
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: So/so quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a decently comfortable shoe,atrocious wet surface traction, borderline dangerous , Also very small in the toe area, it forces your toes into a point and helps cause ingrown toenails, the tongue has already ripped and frayed with lost of loose thread after only a month of wearing them at work, probably going to get a different pair soon which is unfortunate
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight shoe. Looks good and feels comfortable, almost like wearing slippers. Have not ran in them yet (bum knee) but so far a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: VERY stylish. I use these for the gym only and they are comfy as well! I ordered the collegiate blue/white (and I'm a woman lol) but they still fit me perfectly. Very pleased! I might just buy the maroon pair as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adidas fit PERFECT! Shoes are really comfortable, havent tested them for a run yet! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mario T.

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great. Wish it was available through prime
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great. Wish it was available through prime. Not cool that the black and white are a bit more expensive. Would be a 5 star if those things were different.
customer_reviews.author: Jereme Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Initially very comfortable shoes. Good arch support, heel fits snug, plenty wide enough. Will update after first run.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jacob Leo bernier

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return these shoes because after I purchased these shoes online I bought a pair of Adidas Ultra Boost Uncaged shoes at the Mall. Then I received the gray Solar Boost shoes & wore them around the house & decided I couldn't part with them. Adidas is really stepping up their game with the boost & cloud foam athletic shoes. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Katreeb

customer_reviews.title: Heel Ripper
customer_reviews.text: Worst shoe of any Adidas shoe I've ever worn. It has very poor heel support with leather-like pieces not quite coming together, with a seam of heavy stitching holding the fabric together in the middle. It will literally rip the skin on your heel apart. I thought it might just be my tender heels (which they aren't) so I put on heavy bandages. Even with that, it ripped open new blood blisters on them. This goes down as a disaster in the history shoes in my book.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back because they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes... BUT WRONG SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came and they were really nice, fits somewhat snug only cause the shoes came in 1 size bigger for I don't know what reason. I asked for a size 9 pair of maroons and they shipped me a size 10 pair. Can people not read or what?...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 yr old son. I expected them to last at least for a few months but within a few weeks the lip on the front was peeling away and the material had rips in the front row area. My son is rough in shoes but for the amount of money I paid I would have expected them to last longer and not fall apart after a few weeks. My son has high arches and there wasn't great arch support so we had to buy gel insoles with better arch support. Pretty disappointed considering it's always been a good brand with a reputable product.
customer_reviews.author: HMBheather

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Men's Solar Boost M Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Push to the head of the pack in our latest men’s running shoes. With every stride, revolutionary boost energy foam propels you forward, helping you run faster with way less effort. Breathability plays a huge factor too. The new mesh overlay keeps your feet cooler (and socks drier) even on the hottest days.
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh sneaker with lace-up vamp and padded collar
